Additional Scope Comments: Cut off in five-year blocks at the end of the calendar year; transfer email records 15 years after the cutoff.
Legacy Email Scope: TTB will apply the Capstone approach to email records management (GRS 6.1) retrospectively to all available legacy email.  TTB has some permanent email from accounts that pre-date 2003 that were active at the time of re-organization, which originated with TTB's predecessor organization within the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, and Firearms (ATF).  Email from accounts inactive at the time of re-organization were not transferred to TTB.  ATF is responsible for managing these records.  Also, pre-dated 2003 printed email records are maintained in respective industry/case file disposed as per record schedule.
